scripts.start: npm run start:win || npm run start:unix
scripts.debug: npm run debug:win || npm run debug:unix
scripts.dev: npm run down:dev && docker compose -p ministerra -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev up -d redis-primary redis-replica1 redis-sentinel1 redis-sentinel2 redis-sentinel3 mysql mysql-replica mysql-replica-init prometheus grafana loki promtail-dev tempo otel-collector node-exporter cadvisor redis-exporter mysqld-exporter blackbox-exporter traefik && docker compose -p ministerra -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev up backend-app
scripts.dev:unix: npm run down:dev && docker compose -p ministerra -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev up -d redis-primary redis-replica1 redis-sentinel1 redis-sentinel2 redis-sentinel3 mysql mysql-replica mysql-replica-init prometheus grafana loki promtail-dev tempo otel-collector node-exporter cadvisor redis-exporter mysqld-exporter blackbox-exporter traefik && docker compose -p ministerra -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev up backend-app
scripts.dev:win: npm run down:dev && docker compose -p ministerra -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev up -d redis-primary redis-replica1 redis-sentinel1 redis-sentinel2 redis-sentinel3 mysql mysql-replica mysql-replica-init prometheus grafana loki promtail-dev tempo otel-collector node-exporter cadvisor redis-exporter mysqld-exporter blackbox-exporter traefik && docker compose -p ministerra -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev up backend-app
scripts.dev:host: npm run dev:host:win || npm run dev:host:unix
scripts.dev:host:unix: docker compose --profile dev up -d redis-primary redis-replica1 redis-sentinel1 redis-sentinel2 redis-sentinel3 mysql mysql-replica mysql-replica-init && REDIS_USE_SENTINEL=true REDIS_SENTINEL_NAME=mymaster REDIS_SENTINELS=127.0.0.1:26379,127.0.0.1:26380,127.0.0.1:26381 TZ=UTC tsx --watch app.ts
scripts.dev:host:win: docker compose --profile dev up -d redis-primary redis-replica1 redis-sentinel1 redis-sentinel2 redis-sentinel3 mysql mysql-replica mysql-replica-init && set REDIS_USE_SENTINEL=true && set REDIS_SENTINEL_NAME=mymaster && set REDIS_SENTINELS=127.0.0.1:26379,127.0.0.1:26380,127.0.0.1:26381 && set TZ=UTC && tsx --watch app.ts
scripts.min: npm run min:win || npm run min:unix
scripts.min:unix: npm run down:min && docker compose -p ministerra -f docker-compose.yml --profile min up --no-attach redis-primary --no-attach mysql backend-min frontend-dev
scripts.min:win: npm run down:min && docker compose -p ministerra -f docker-compose.yml --profile min up --no-attach redis-primary --no-attach mysql backend-min frontend-dev
scripts.reset: npm run down:all && docker network prune -f
